page.title: 14Sport in Allenton, Derby
page.content: Close by the Municipal Sports ground are the Regional Swimming Pool and Moor Lane Sports Centre. The Sports Centre is used for squash, badminton, table-tennis, weight lifting, trampolining, judo, indoor athletics and even old time dancing. It is used by people of five years old and upwards. More men than women use it. The weight lifting is used most often by the Afro-Carribean nationals as a body-building exercise and the Asians are especially keen on power lifting. The Regional Swimming Pool is used by the general public and also by local swimming clubs for their weekly training sessions and for holding Galas. There are two pools, a teaching pool and the main pool. There is a diving board in the main pool.
